description: FOR THE DELIVERY OF CT6 PARACHUTE SYSTEM KIT ASSEMBLY AT CAAWC TRENTON.
full_summary:
### CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number
W8485-237242/A

#### Tender Closing Date
November 21, 2022, at 14:00 EST

#### Solicitation Details
The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the assembly of [40] CT6 Parachute System Kits. The requirement is broken down into three lots with delivery dates requested at:

* December 22, 2022
* March 31, 2024
* March 31, 2025

The items to be assembled are as follows:

* NSN 1670-21-920-5292
* CT6 Parachute System Kit Assembly
* Part No.: ID-81-142
* NCAGE: 57172 (ASNA)

Bidders are required to submit an electronic bid using the epost Connect service. However, submissions may be made in either official language of Canada.

#### Selection Criteria
The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

#### Relevant Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
* Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
* Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7
